text: Omoni te ete baye bakobete ntolo ete bango bandimi na maye tokitiselaki yo, mpe na maye tokitisaki epai ya baye bayaki liboso nayo? Bango balingaka kosambisa mambi ma bango epai ya motomboki. nzoka nde batindamaki ete bapengwa na yango. Kasi satana alingi kobungisa bango na libunga moko ya mosika
